# Estimate Pi
```{r}
# Approximate Pi
func1 <- function(N) {
  x <- runif(N)
  y <- runif(N)
  W <- sum(x^2 + y^2 < 1)
  4*W/N
}

N <- 1e6
func1(N)
```
